         Careers 
       
              


 


   CAREERS 
 Karnalyte Resources Inc. is developing a greenfield solution potash mine near Wynyard, Saskatchewan, 180 km East of Saskatoon, and is forming an Engineering, Geology, and Operations team to work in our Saskatoon Office. The complex activities will include drilling of wells to the carnallite layers, transferring brine to the plant process, and producing only high grade potash products. We are now filling the following senior positions to carry out detailed design/construction and operation of this multiple phase development. 
 These will be challenging positions to contribute to a fast paced multiple phase project, with room for personal growth and advancement. Karnalyte offers competitive salaries and benefits. 
 All Engineering positions require a Bachelor’s Degree in discipline engineering and registration or eligibility for transfer as a Professional Engineer in Saskatchewan. All applicants must be eligible to work in Canada. Potash and solution mining experience is a definite asset. 
 We welcome your application, however, only those individuals selected for an interview will be contacted. 
 To reply, please email your resumé to: careers@karnalyte.com 
 Karnalyte Careers
